title: Why do you listen to sad songs and cry for the love you've never had? - Quora

response.answer_text: Same reason I listened to the “ the Blue Danueb" - I never waltzed. An fortunate for me that love I do have. Its only sad when your expectations an desires are not met but the love does not disappear. It's true you can't miss nothing you never had.
Its your soul connectinh to your twin. A/ the love your soul wants. Be strong, its here. No more tears❤
